Now, let's write the full Fortran code. First, the variables:

program main

    implicit none

    integer :: h, a, num, oddCount, M, n, i, result

    character(len=20) :: s1, s2

    character(len=6) :: s3

    integer, dimension(0:6,1:2) :: dp

    integer, dimension(0:127) :: counts =0

    ! First part: compute num

    read*, h, a

    num = (h + a -1)/a

    ! Convert num to string s1

    write(s1, '(i0)') num

    s1 = adjustl(s1)

    ! Second part: process s1 to get s2

    counts =0

    do i=1, len_trim(s1)

        counts(ichar(s1(i:i))) = counts(ichar(s1(i:i))) +1

    end do

    oddCount =0

    do i=0,127

        if (mod(counts(i),2) ==1) then

            oddCount = oddCount +1

        end if

    end do

    if ( (oddCount <=1) .or. (mod(oddCount,2) ==1) ) then

        s2 = 'First'

    else

        s2 = 'Second'

    end if

    ! Third part: process s2 through DP

    M = 1000000007

    n = len_trim(s2)

    s3 = s2

    dp =0

    dp(0,1) =1

    dp(0,2) =0

    do i=1, n

        character(len=1) :: current_char

        current_char = s3(i:i)

        ! First part

        if (current_char == '0') then

            dp(i,1) = dp(i-1,1)

            dp(i,2) = dp(i-1,2)

        else

            dp(i,2) = mod( dp(i-1,1) + dp(i-1,2), M )

        end if

        ! Second part

program main

    implicit none

    integer :: h, a, num, oddCount, M, n, i, result

    character(len=20) :: s1, s2

    character(len=6) :: s3

    integer, dimension(0:6,1:2) :: dp

    integer, dimension(0:127) :: counts =0

    ! First part: compute num

    read*, h, a

    num = (h + a -1)/a

    ! Convert num to string s1

    write(s1, '(i0)') num

    s1 = adjustl(s1)

    ! Second part: process s1 to get s2

    counts =0

    do i=1, len_trim(s1)

        counts(ichar(s1(i:i))) = counts(ichar(s1(i:i))) +1

    end do

    oddCount =0

    do i=0,127

        if (mod(counts(i),2) ==1) then

            oddCount = oddCount +1

        end if

    end do

    if ( (oddCount <=1) .or. (mod(oddCount,2) ==1) ) then

        s2 = 'First'

    else

        s2 = 'Second'

    end if

    ! Third part: process s2 through DP

    M = 1000000007

    n = len_trim(s2)

    s3 = s2

    dp =0

    dp(0,1) =1

    dp(0,2) =0

    do i=1, n

        character(len=1) :: current_char

        current_char = s3(i:i)

        ! First part

        if (current_char == '0') then

            dp(i,1) = dp(i-1,1)

            dp(i,2) = dp(i-1,2)

        else

            dp(i,2) = mod( dp(i-1,1) + dp(i-1,2), M )

        end if

        ! Second part

        if (current_char == '0') then

            dp(i,2) = mod( dp(i,2) + 2*dp(i-1,2), M )

        else

            dp(i,1) = mod( dp(i,1) + 2*dp(i-1,1), M )

            dp(i,2) = mod( dp(i,2) + 2*dp(i-1,2), M )

        end if

    end do

    result = mod( dp(n,1) + dp(n,2), M )

    print*, result

end program main
